ygData.subject: (Off-Topic) Some advice?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well if you decide against Everlore there is always Allakhazams site as well as the EQLizer site.  IMO those two are much better sites than Everlore. Galtin
ygData.messageBody:
Well if you decide against Everlore there is always Allakhazams site as well
as the EQLizer site. IMO those two are much better sites than Everlore.

Galtin

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Monday, March 27, 2000 8:09 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] (Off-Topic) Some advice?


From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

This is totally not Bard related, but it is EQ-related.

I was (asked? offered?) a place on EverLore.com for the EQ Glossary. I've
turned down one previous offer because the site looked like crud, and had
nothing to offer in return. This one, however, is offering to build a
database to house the glossary (making updates Ooooh so easy), at the cost
of losing my banners. While this may seem like a no-brainer (especially
considering I make NO money from the banners I'm currently hosting), they
are for friends of mine, and I'd hate to lose even this piddling little
advertising for them. Unfortunately, Everlore is very strict :P No
banners from outside sources.

I haven't read the contract yet - waiting on a reply about that now. But I
am really ambivalent about this (I *knew* I'd find a way to use that word
this week ;)

So here's my dilemma - and I'm not saying that you guys are going to solve
it for me - I just need some unbiased input here - Do I take the Lady or
the Tiger?


Talies the Wanderer
